title: Ron Wilkinson Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship support in the College of Engineering and Applied Science at UCCS. Candidate must be pursuing a degree in mechanical engineering with preference given to a student who has interest in working in the MAE shop.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support in the College of Engineering and Applied Science at UCCS. Candidate must be pursuing a degree in mechanical engineering with preference given to a student who has interest in working in the MAE shop.
